ratings.comment: Troxel is a good professor but a very strict grader. An A starts from 93 percent, and even if you work hard and get good grades in the in-class tests, he throws you off in the paper. The only source of material is his lecture so take good notes.

Troxel is a very cool guy! Lectures are good in reterospect, during it can get long. Be patient with his extended examples and write down EVERY WORD. This will be really helpful for the tests. Consult text for test questions, no reason to read otherwise. This class got me really interested in Biblical Literature --- very cool. I would recommend!!

Lectures are pretty terrible unless you have a deep interest in tiny details of the Old Testament. The book is helpful and you get the test questions before the test, but I would not recommend this class.

Let me first say that Prof. Troxel is an extremely intelligent man. However, I do not find him to be a very good professor. His lectures were boring, and his power points make it difficult to take notes. He never repeats anything, and basically gives a speech every lecture. He is a pretty easy grader at least.
Great informative teacher. Is super nice and knows his stuff. Gives exam questions in advance which makes it easy for an A, if you attend lecture. Reading helps but isn't nessecary
Extremely informed on the subjects. Give exam questions in advance so you know exactly whats coming.
Best teacher this semester. He is a great teacher and gives out the questions for th e test a week before. Meet up with study groups to get an A. Must attend lecture, and must take notes.
I love his classes
Incomprehensible and boring!
No Comments

My favorite professor I've ever had. One of the smartest guys around,very friendly and loves questions. If you try to argue with him he will patiently and happily show you that he certainly knows what he's talking about. He's the one that inspired me to pursue this field. The exams weren't hard, the hardest part was the paper.

Boring, boring, dry, boring.  I was truly interested in the subject until I took his class.  Yes, he's smart, but he's not a good teacher.  I learned way more from discussion and study groups than I ever did in lecture.  P.S. DO THE STUDY GROUPS.
Easy class, essay exams are based off readings/posted lectures online, hardest part of class was the 8-10pg paper

Troxel was amazing.  Hard to understand exactly what he is saying in lecture until you have the exam/essay questions and know what to look for.  Must attend class & must attend review sessions with other students.  If you don't have the material in your notebook than you need to get it from somebody else.
This man knows his stuff.  Almost overqualified for UW!!

He's incredible smart...lectures are incredible packed - and he tends to be a bit dry. Lectures are read from a prepared manuscript that he posts online - helps for the exams though. Creates a study guide with exact questions from the exam (10 questions and he chooses 4 for the exam). Fair - but boring. Only take if really interested in this.
Troxel really knows what he is talking about!  And he always has the same format for exams - essay questions given out a week in advance - very fair!

i love troxel!! -- dave was an amazing TA as well. lectures were a bit dry at times and yes, many times it went way over my head ... sometimes you just had to sit back and be in awe of troxel's knowledge and the amaziness that where his powerpoints. paper and exams graded very easy. 10 ?'s given a wk before and 4 are on the exam -- definately fair

Interesting class and great guy-really knows his stuff.  We had three essay exams and one small paper (4-6 page).  The exams were very fair and he gives you the questions one week ahead to study.  I would recommend this class to anyone with a passing interest in the subject, or who loves taking classes from excellent professors.

Professor Troxel is a brilliant man, but still very down to earth and completely approachable. Lecture can be a overload of info and at times the professor is just simple too smartt in the subjec for the students to comprehend at times lol, but study with you classmates for tests and you should be fine.
clear, funny, knowledgable.  gret professor.
the man is brilliant and one of the nicest fellows around. completely approachable, fair exams/papers, etc etc etc. take any or all of his classes.
Awesome smart guy, fair exams.

This guy is awesome. He gives you a lot of info during lectures, but if you get a study group together a few times before each test, you will do just fine. He is really funny and extremely smart. He knows like a million languages too!
I've had Dr Troxel for many classes and he is very clear about his expectations and makes the subject interesting.

I have taken three of his classes and he is also my advisor. what an amazing person. he is always willing to help, answers questions thoughtfully and clearly. his tests are extremely fair, and use material from every lecture (so don't skip often). take any class he offers, you'll learn so much.
He's a nice guy and all but he rambles on forever and gets boring very quickly. Tests are fine as long as you go to lecture and can stay awake.
dr. troxel was such a great prof. definitely my favorite class of the semester. lectures were interesting and fun and the assignments were great. take his class!
No Comments
good lecturer, fair exams
Great professor- clear, organized lectures, and overall a really cool guy.  Great class, too.
